ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Pioneer 10 Charged Particle Composition (CPC) 15-min Count Rates

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata
Added PublicationInfo. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains coincidence mode counts and accumulation times, plus "box counts" based on pulse height analysis (PHA), at 15-min resolution. There are 11 coincidence mode counts and 27 "box counts." Taken together, the parameters included allow computation of average counting rates and of fluxes of protons, electrons, helium and CNO nuclei in selected energy windows corresponding to the PHA boxes. There are 12 proton boxes spanning 3-67 MeV, 5 helium boxes spanning 3-67 MeV/n, 5 electron boxes, 2 Z>2 boxes, 1 box each for CNO, Z>5, and E>67 MeV/n.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the PI (the late John A. Simpson) and Bruce McKibben.

AccessURL.Name: FTPS from SPDF (not with most browsers)
HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: In CDF via HTTP from SPDF

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the PI, the late John A. Simpson, Bruce McKibben, and the GSFC Space Physics Data Facility

Parameter.Name: Coincidence mode counts
Parameter.Description: Counts accumulated over 15 minutes in each of 11 distinct multi-sensor coincidence modes

Structure.Description: The 11 counts are in words 6, 8, ... 26 of the data records.

Parameter.Name: Accumulation times for the 11 coincidence mode counts
Parameter.Description: Durations (seconds) over which counts were accumulated within this 15 minute interval in each of 11 distinct multi-sensor coincidence modes

Structure.Description: The 11 accumulation times are in words 5, 7, ... 25 of the data records. The accumulation time of word 5 is for the counts of word 6, etc.

Parameter.Name: Total numbers of Pulse Height events analyzed
Parameter.Description: Total numbers of Pulse Height events analyzed for each of 5 coincidence modes (ID1, ID2, ID5, ID7+ID13, ID13) for this 15-min interval

Structure.Description: The 5 counts are in words 27-31 of the data records.

Parameter.Name: Box counts for 27 boxes
Parameter.Description: Counts of pulse height analyzed events, in each of several coincidence modes, corresponding to segments (boxes) of tracks in dE/dx - E associated with specific species and energy ranges. See species and energy range information in above description.

Structure.Description: The 27 box counts are in words 32-58 of the data records.

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft position vector
Parameter.Description: Heliocentric distance (in AU, *100) and heliographic latitude and longitude angles (in deg, *100) of the spacecraft.

Structure.Description: Longitude, latitude and radial dictance are in words 59, 60, 61 of the data records, respectively
